title: State of the Word 2025 Recap: The Top Highlights
description: State of the Word 2025 delivered big news — a live 6.9 release, new AI foundations, and a year of record growth across the ecosystem. Catch up on the top takeaways.
content: On December 2, WordPress co-founder Matt Mullenweg, Executive Director Mary Hubbard, and Lead Architect Matías Ventura took the stage in San Francisco joined by contributors and guests from around th… [+5768 chars]
